description: Ms. codex. Title from fol. 1a (title page of Juzʼ 1), combined with fol. 445a (colophon of Juzʼ 2). 31 lines per page. Written in clear medium small naskh in black ink with use of red. Light cream paper with laid and chain lines visible. Table of contents by another hand on fol. 1a. Title on the lower edge of the text block: "al-Jild al-awwal min al-Dhakhīrah". Inscription in Arabic script on a label pasted on the upper cover: "408/409". Inscription in Arabic script on a label pasted on the pastedown of the upper cover: "260 ḥāʼ". Copy of Juzʼ 1 completed on 1 Jumādá al-Ākhirah 946 by ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻUthmān ibn al-Ṣawā [or Saghā or Ṣafā](colophon Juzʼ 1, fol. 197a). Incipit: الحمد لله مستحق ال[حم]د والثناء ومنزل اللطف والنعما كاشف الضرآ ... قال الصدر الامام ... قد جمعت انا حداية سني وعنفوان عمري Explicit: صغيرة كان او كبيرة لها زوج اولا زوج لها هكذا اذكر محمد رحمد الله والله اعلم بالصواب واليه المرجع والماب هذا اخره والله اعلم نجز الجزو الثانى بحمد الله وعونه ... وصلى الله .... يتلوه ... فى اول الجزو الثالث كتاب الحدود
author: Marghīnānī, Maḥmūd ibn Aḥmad, 1156 or 1157-1219 or 1220
abstract: First and second parts of a treatise on Ḥanafī law, a summary of the author's al-Muḥīṭ al-Burhānī fī al-fiqh al-Nuʻmānī, comprising Kitāb al-Ṭahārah to Kitāb al-Īmān.
alternative: دخيرة الفتاوى المشهورة بذخيرة البرهانية للامام برهان الدين محمود بن عبد العزيز بن عمر بن مازة البخاري اختصرها من كتابه المشهور بمحيط
extent: i + ii, 445, iv + 1 leaves: paper ; 260 x 170 (195 x 115) mm. bound to 260 x 180 mm.
title: al-Juzʼ al-awwal min al-Dhakhīrah ; al-Juzʼ al-thānī min al-Dhakhīrah
provenance: From the books of Aḥmad Nūr al-Dīn, known as Nūḥādīʹzādah(?) (ownership statement, fol. 1a). Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
creator: مرغيناني، محمود بن احمد
subject: Marghīnānī, Maḥmūd ibn Aḥmad, 1156 or 1157-1219 or 1220—Muḥīṭ al-Burhānī fī al-fiqh al-Nuʻmānī. Abridgment
binding_note: Pink, black, green and white marbled paper paper pastedown, covered by pink paper pastedown and free endpaper.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
